title: You don’t need to swipe right. AI is transforming dating apps.
description: Meet your artificial intelligence matchmakers. These A.I. tools are changing dating apps, so users don't have to swipe through an endless scroll of profiles.
content:
SAN FRANCISCO: After swiping aimlessly for years on dating apps like Hinge and Tinder, Emma Inge, a 25-year-old project manager in San Francisco, decided to try something different.

title: Jensen Huang Warns China Will Win The AI Race Days After Donald Trump Said US Won't Let 'Anybody' Have Nvidia's Most Advanced Chips
description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang warned that China could overtake the U.S. in artificial intelligence development due to cheaper energy and fewer regulations, just days after President Donald Trump reaffirmed a ban on selling Nvidia's most advanced chips to Beijing.
content:
On Wednesday, Nvidia Corporation (NASDAQ:NVDA) CEO Jensen Huang warned that China is poised to surpass the U.S. in artificial intelligence development, citing cheaper energy and looser regulations that give Beijing an edge.

title: 'Vibe coding' named word of the year by Collins Dictionary
description: The art of making an app by describing it to artificial intelligence (AI) tops 10 new terms on the shortlist.
content:
If you've ever wanted to create your own computer program but never learnt how to code, you might try "vibe coding".
Collins Dictionary's word of the year - which is confusingly made up of two words - is the art of making an app or website by describ... [2399 chars]

title: Agoda Releases AI Developer Report 2025: How Engineers Work with AI Across Southeast Asia and India
description: **media[815157]**Study finds AI adoption is nearly universal, with 95% of developers across Southeast Asia and India using it weekly.87% of developers are upskilling for the AI era, showing strong optimism despite uneven access to training.Developers are using AI pragmatically, prioritizing speed and quality over full automation.SINGAPORE, Nov. 6, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- A new study released today by digital travel platform Agoda shows that artificial intelligence (AI) adoption is high among software developers in Southeast Asia and India, but its usage is still maturing. Developers use it pragmatically to accelerate work without compromising quality, while organizations face the challenge of putting in place the policies, practices, and frameworks needed to support the next phase of AI evolution in the region.**media[815158]**
content:
Study finds AI adoption is nearly universal, with 95% of developers across Southeast Asia and India using it weekly.
87% of developers are upskilling for the AI era, showing strong optimism despite uneven access to training.
Developers are using AI p... [4750 chars]

title: Sequoia Plans for More AI, Less Partisanship Under Grady and Lin
description: Sequoia Capital’s new co-stewards, Pat Grady and Alfred Lin, plan to deepen the venture capital firm’s focus on the artificial intelligence sector while working to reframe its image as less politically partisan following concerns among some partners about the leadership of Roelof Botha, according to people familiar with the matter.

title: AI and protein language models can accelerate the design of antiviral antibodies
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) and "protein language" models can speed the design of monoclonal antibodies that prevent or reduce the severity of potentially life-threatening viral infections, according to a multi-institutional study led by researchers at Vanderbilt University Medical Center.

title: King Charles sends another strong message in fight against artificial intelligence after giving top tech boss a letter warning of danger posed by AI
description: Nvidia founder Jensen Huang said the king personally handed him a copy of a 2023 speech he delivered about artificial intelligence.
content:
King Charles gave a top tech boss a letter warning of the dangers posed by artificial intelligence - sending another strong message in his campaign to tackle the risks of AI.
